I work on the connection of biological 🧠 and artificial 🤖 intelligence. I work with John Duncan and Matt Botvinick.

As a creative, I've worked with some of the biggest brands in the world, including Samsung, Amazon, Adobe, and dozens more.

My most impactful project was creating Folks, PillPack/Amazon''s magazine about amazing people living with chronic health conditions.

I'm also a writer of #horror / #weird #fiction, which has been published in Vastarien, Dark Recesses, and The Dread Machine.
